text: â€œTake the finest spices: 500 shekels of liquid myrrh,30:23 500 shekels is approximately 12.6 pounds or 5.7 kilograms of myrrh. half that amount (250 shekels) of fragrant cinnamon,30:23 250 shekels is approximately 6.3 pounds or 2.9 kilograms of cinnamon. 250 shekels of fragrant cane,30:23 250 shekels is approximately 6.3 pounds or 2.9 kilograms of cane.
